channel.title: I can connect, But no one else
channel.description: I've made my own server, Right. I can connect with 127.0.0.1 but no one else can connect. I've given them my Ip and made the port to my exceptions and even tried turning off my firewall, All to no success any ideas on why? :S

Show us some screenies of you doing so.

item.title: I can connect, But no one else
item.dc:creator: @Strangex0rz Strangex0rz
item.description:
@Strangex0rz wrote:

If your behind a router, go to control panel> internet connections > network connections > double click your connection > support tab and type in the internet address bar the default gateway

this is your router settings page

user: [leave blank]
pass: admin
if you cant access it, either the person who controls your router settings page has changed user and pass or has changed the address. if they have either.

you must consult the person controlling your settings page.

Read full topic
item.source: I can connect, But no one else
